column2: #| fig-cap: "Figure 2. Barchart showing the observations of Western Snowy Plovers per Hour by season and survey site.."
# Group by Survey Season and Site, and summarize Total Plover counts by duration (hours)
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'Survey Season'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
ggplot(., aes(x = Site, y = Obs_Hour, fill = `Survey Season`)) +
